personal.bio:
I'm Nikunj Arora, a curious learner and an aspiring innovator, currently studying in Grade 8 at Deens Academy under the CBSE curriculum.

While academics are my foundation, I am equally passionate about football, which drives my discipline, teamwork, and resilience.

Beyond the field and classroom, I have a growing interest in Artificial Intelligence, Business, and Creation. I enjoy how technology and entrepreneurship can shape the future, and I am eager to build knowledge that will help me combine these passions in meaningful ways.
